name: SEALife
description:
Become a Hawaiian monk seal and eat delicious reef snacks. This is my class project for Educational Games and Simulations with Dr. Dan Hoffman.

Instructions

  • Space key to start.
  • Arrow keys to move.
  • Go to the surface for air.
  • Eat animals for health and points.
  • Get 15,000 points to win.

Credits
